0.name: Foresight
0.Text: deal x dmg per opponent card played defense: +2 block per opponent card played

1.name: Quick Thinking
1.Text: consume all remaining ap to draw x extra cards

4.name: Fatal Strike
4.Text: if target part has <8 hp, this card deals +3 dmg

5.name: Counter
5.Text: if opponent play card here, +4 melee dmg next turn

6.name: Grapple
6.Text: hit → enemy next attack card costs +1 ap

7.name: Tight Grip
7.Text: if played melee card this turn: +4 gun dmg next turn

8.name: Blind Fire
8.Text: randomly hit head or leg instead

9.name: Limb-wrench
9.Text: hit → opponent discard 1 random card in hand

11.name: Sweep Kick
11.Text: hit → apply weak this target for 1 turn

12.name: Feint Shot
12.Text: deal additional 1 dmg to the other body part

13.name: Blade Distraction
13.Text: deal 3 dmg to main target, 2 to the other

14.name: Hamstring
14.Text: if opponent has weak here, deal +3 dmg

15.name: Stand Your Ground
15.Text: if opponent play card here, draw 1 extra card

16.name: Take Aim
16.Text: next gun card targeting this part deals +3 dmg

17.name: Bring Gun To Fist Fight
17.Text: when played →  discard a melee card to draw a gun card

18.name: Tactical Reload
18.Text: your next gun card this turn +4 dmg defense: draw a gun card

23.name: Minigun
23.Text: each pts of dmg is dealt to a random body part

24.name: Roll & Load
24.Text: next gun card this turn +4 dmg

25.name: Piercing Shot
25.Text: blocked: deal 2 dmg directly to this body part

26.name: Cat Stance
26.Text: melee combo defense: draw a kick card from anywhere

27.name: Flying Kick
27.Text: discard up to 2 cards in hand, deal +3 dmg per discard

28.name: Sweeping Kick
28.Text: on hit → disable body for 1 turn, otherwise leg

29.name: Preparation
29.Text: choose: your melee/gun dmg +1 this game (cannot stack)

30.name: Armor Melting Rounds
30.Text: piercing 3 defense: your next gun card have piercing 3

31.name: Knock Knock
31.Text: disable a random bodypart that has > 5 hp

32.name: One With Shadows
32.Text: the next card played is hidden

34.name: Smoke Bomb
34.Text: this bodypart is hidden until the end of your next turn.

35.name: Mirror Maze
35.Text: put a fake copy of this in each other bodypart.

36.name: Feint
36.Text: on reveal: play a 1-ap card in another bodypart

38.name: Vertical Slice
38.Text: deal 1 dmg to body and leg

48.name: One Step Ahead
48.Text: on hit → their next two attacks are exposed.

49.name: Omega Throw
49.Text: on hit → reveal a random card in their hand.

50.name: Omega Throw
50.Text: on hit → reveal a random card in their hand.

51.name: Plus One Shot
51.Text: must be played with another melee attack

52.name: Disorient
52.Text: when played → apply weak to their head.

53.name: Head Scissors Lock
53.Text: the next card they draw is exposed.

54.name: Dodge Head
54.Text: play a random melee card from your discards

56.name: Wraparound
56.Text: on hit → you discard a random card.

58.name: Rapid Strikes
58.Text: when played → if you have no cards in hand, draw a card.

59.name: Push The Pace
59.Text: when played → discard a card to play two 1 ap cards from your discards.

60.name: Disorient
60.Text: when played → apply weak to their head.

62.name: Rapid Kick
62.Text: when played → if you have no cards in hand, draw one.

63.name: Finishing Shot
63.Text: if they have a weak or destroyed body part, this does double damage

65.name: Ricochet Trap
65.Text: on block → deals 2 dmg to random body part

67.name: Flashbang
67.Text: all enemy cards next turn are exposed

68.name: Low Blow
68.Text: on hit →their melee card cost +1ap next turn

69.name: Tactical Strike
69.Text: on hit → gain +1 ap next turn

70.name: Body Slam
70.Text: deal +4 dmg if enemy has weak

71.name: Crumpling Strike
71.Text: apply weak to head and body

73.name: Zen State
73.Text: your first gun card next turn gains +3 dmg

74.name: Execution
74.Text: if head hp is 4 or less, deal double damage

76.name: Adrenaline
76.Text: take 2 dmg to body. draw 2 cards

77.name: Open Fire
77.Text: deal dmg to all body parts

78.name: Counter Stance
78.Text: if enemy attacks your body, deal 4 dmg

80.name: Jab
80.Text: tempo 1 defense: draw a random melee combo 2 card

83.name: Hook
83.Text: tempo 3 → return this card to hand

84.name: Shoulder Push
84.Text: tempo (*) defense: draw a next melee combo card

86.name: Clinch
86.Text: tempo (*) hit → opponent first attack card cost +1 ap next turn

87.name: Headbutt
87.Text: tempo 2 → apply weak tempo 3 → apply daze

89.name: Crouching Stance
89.Text: 1 ap cards and below deal +1 dmg for 2 turns

90.name: Slip
90.Text: tempo 1 blocked: play a cross card here

91.name: Bob & Weave
91.Text: tempo 1/2 successful dodge allow current tempo level effect trigger again

92.name: Block
92.Text: tempo 1/2 defense: if opponent hit here, deal 2 dmg

93.name: Liver Shot
93.Text: tempo 3 → discard all opponent hand, reshuffle their deck and redraw the same amount

94.name: Hidden Stash
94.Text: when played → add 2 random throw card to your hand

95.name: Scavenge
95.Text: get 3 throw cards defense: get a throw card per card your opponent plays

96.name: Peace Of Mind
96.Text: end of turn: gain random throw card per throw card played this turn

97.name: Ninja Storm
97.Text: play 4 random throw card each targeting a random bodypart

99.name: Up The Sleeves
99.Text: repeat your last throw card here twice

100.name: Hidden Strings
100.Text: deal 1 dmg per throw card played last turn defense: deals 1 dmg per card targeting here

101.name: Hidden Pocket
101.Text: gain 1 random throw card every turn

104.name: Packet Of Sand
104.Text: exhaust throw combo apply blind for 1 turn

106.name: Planning
106.Text: when played → choose: gain 1 ap or draw 1 extra card

107.name: Combo Strike
107.Text: melee combo draw a melee card

108.name: Combo Strike
108.Text: melee combo when played → get a follow up punch

109.name: Follow Up Punch
109.Text: melee combo exhaust at end of turn

110.name: Weapon Master
110.Text: your gun cards have gun combo

111.name: Si Bi Quan
111.Text: next melee card deal +4 dmg defense → draw 1 iron fist card

112.name: Qi Gong Technique
112.Text: your next 2 melee cards cost -1 ap

114.name: Qi Gong Mastery
114.Text: +1 block for every iron card in hand for 1 turn

116.name: Three-circle Stance
116.Text: draw 1 tactics card partial blocked → deal 4 dmg

117.name: Ma Bu
117.Text: deal dmg equal to total block value in hand

120.name: Gong Bu
120.Text: melee combo (*) defense → draw 1 kick card

121.name: Crescent Kick
121.Text: hit head → daze hit body → draw 1 iron body card

122.name: Warrior Monk
122.Text: plays all 3 iron card in its target zone at halved dmg if you have iron card in hand deal full dmg

123.name: Coat Weaponry
123.Text: your next 4 attack card applies toxic 1

124.name: Concentrated Formula
124.Text: extend all opponent status effect here by 2

125.name: Gas Bomb
125.Text: apply toxic 1 if target part has <8 hp, apply toxic 3 instead

126.name: Toxin Infused Dagger
126.Text: choose: apply toxic 2 or consume 1 toxic > +2 dmg

127.name: Viper’s Block
127.Text: apply toxic 2 defense: +x block per toxic stack here

128.name: Toxic Reversion
128.Text: consume all status effect → deal dmg equal to its stacks

129.name: Toxic Research Ii
129.Text: exhaust > tr iii toxic now deals 2 dmg instead

130.name: High Table Decree
130.Text: deal dmg equal to number of tactics cards in both players hand

131.name: The Rules Are The Rules
131.Text: choose 2 body parts → swap order of body parts

132.name: You Have Seven Days
132.Text: exhaust after 7 cards are played here → destroy this bodypart

133.name: Consider This… Leniency
133.Text: choose (self / enemy) → redistribute hp evenly across all body parts

135.name: Rapid Punch
135.Text: play a random melee card from your draw/discard pile

136.name: Cane Jab
136.Text: head: apply daze body: apply weak 2

137.name: Blind Swordsmanship
137.Text: blocked: deal 3 dmg defense: draw a melee card

138.name: Feint Jab
138.Text: on resolve → move this card to the other body part

139.name: Cane Strike
139.Text: choose: apply weak 2 or melee combo *

140.name: Timing Attack
140.Text: next time you play a  gun card → deal 4 dmg here

141.name: Overwatch
141.Text: hidden next time you are attacked here, deal 4 dmg to opponent

142.name: Warning Shot
142.Text: hidden next time you are attacked here, take 1 dmg to dodge the attack

143.name: Heavy Caliber
143.Text: your next gun card  has +3 dmg

144.name: Gambit
144.Text: get a copy of the last tactic card opponent plays defense: put this in you ally pile and draw another ally card

146.name: Continental Manager
146.Text: exhaust get 6 block randomly on bodyparts every turn  when you play an attack card → reduce that value by 2 this turn

147.name: Betrayal
147.Text: excommunicado: deals dmg equal to hp of this bodypart, otherwise dmg is dealt to weakest bodypart

148.name: Leverage
148.Text: opponent cannot play (3-cost/tactics) card next turn defense: put this in you ally pile and draw another ally card

149.name: Master Tactician
149.Text: gain backup plan 1 defense: draw an extra tactics card

150.name: Continental Grounds
150.Text: get +3 block for your next 2 blocks defense: if opponent play >= 2 attack cards this turn, apply “excommunicado”

151.name: Hired Guns
151.Text: excommunicado: deals dmg equal to hp of this bodypart, otherwise deals 2 dmg to random bodypart at the start of the next 3 turns

154.name: Flurry
154.Text: sync atk: repeat the activator card here

155.name: Opening Jab
155.Text: sync atk: gain 1 ap next turn

158.name: Feint Shot
158.Text: sync atk: activator card is hidden

159.name: In-sync
159.Text: when played → activates next sync atk card this turn

161.name: Martial Master
161.Text: melee combo 4 → play the last melee card

163.name: Tenacious Will
163.Text: gain 2 block here for 1 turn hold: both block values +2

164.name: Coat Armory
164.Text: your next 4 defense card applies toxic 1

165.name: Toxic Research I
165.Text: exhaust >tr ii when toxic dmg triggers, another body part with toxic triggers too

166.name: Toxic Research Iii
166.Text: exhaust toxic application now immediately trigger dmg instead

167.name: Siphon Bomb
167.Text: double toxic here defense (exhaust): consume status effect to heal x yourself per stack

168.name: Experimental Leech
168.Text: choose: apply toxic 2 or consume 1 toxic > heal 2

169.name: The Rules Are The Rules
169.Text: you cannot play an attack card here next turn

170.name: Seven Cuts
170.Text: deal 7 dmg randomly across body parts

171.name: High Table Decree
171.Text: you cannot play a defense card here next turn

173.name: Incendiary Rounds
173.Text: exhaust your next gun card have +1 dmg

174.name: Brass Knuckles
174.Text: your next melee card have +2 dmg

175.name: Deadly Mark
175.Text: mark a random bodypart: on hit, gain 1 ap next turn (does not stack)

177.name: Angry Punch
177.Text: if played on bodypart with <= 6 hp: dmg +2

178.name: Very Angry Punch
178.Text: if played on bodypart with <= 6 hp: cost -1 ap

179.name: Desperate Strike
179.Text: if played on broken bodypart: dmg +4

180.name: Double Throw
180.Text: sync atk: throw 1 random attack card from hand into a random bodypart

181.name: Close Quarters Throw
181.Text: if opponent plays a melee card here, move throw here into another body part

182.name: Forceful Pull
182.Text: regain throw card from here last turn, deal 1 dmg per throwables gained

183.name: Throw Hatchet
183.Text: if this is the only card in your hand, piercing 7, otherwise piercing 5

184.name: Backstab
184.Text: if enemy is exposed, +1 dmg and pierce 4

186.name: Curb Stomp
186.Text: if enemy body or leg < 5, deal double damage

190.name: Second Wind
190.Text: on defend → gain ap based on dmg received

192.name: Quick Throw
192.Text: deal 1 dmg to head deal 2 dmg to body deal 1 dmg to leg
